attributes.action: For the stability of the UK, any future in/out EU referendums should be denied.
attributes.additional_details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/131215 

The above is the current request for a new debate for a referendum. The people have spoken and this petition should be denied for the reasons of national interest.
attributes.background: There is an ongoing petition for a new EU in/out debate which could lead to a new referendum. This obviously could lead to future referendums on the same subject which would hinder the governance of the United Kingdom severely, is untenable and would destabilize our system of democracy.
